FORM_SECTION.HELP:
Here you can configure SuperProductivity to list open GitHub issues for a specific repository in the task creation panel in the daily planning view. They will be listed as suggestions and will provide a link to the issue as well as more information about it.

In addition you can automatically add and sync all open issues to your task backlog.

To get by usage limits and to access you can provide a an access token. More info about its scopes can be found here.

D_INITIAL.TEXT:
IdeƒÖ Harmonogramu jest lepsze pokazanie, jak zaplanowane zadania uk≈ÇadajƒÖ siƒô w czasie. Harmonogram jest generowany automatycznie na podstawie Twoich zada≈Ñ i rozr√≥≈ºnia: Zadania zaplanowane (pokazywane o wyznaczonym czasie) oraz Zadania zwyk≈Çe, kt√≥re ‚Äûwype≈ÇniajƒÖ‚Äù przestrze≈Ñ pomiƒôdzy sta≈Çymi wydarzeniami. Wszystkie zadania uwzglƒôdniajƒÖ przypisane im estymacje czasu.

WEB_DAV.CORS_INFO: Making it work on MOBILE and in the browser: To make this work for mobile or the browser you need to whitelist Super Productivity for CORS requests for your Nextcloud instance. This can have negative security implications! Please refer to this thread for more information. One approach to make this work on mobile is whitelisting "https://app.super-productivity.com" via the nextcloud app webapppassword. Use at your own risk!
